songs.title: Devil May Care
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
(Crow calls)
Now tell us about your work with the Devil

[Verse 1]
Grey skies signify
Calm before the storm, then I arrive
Striking fear into the hearts of men
But I’d rather be feared than loved, I walk in
With the West Coast swagger
Mouth like murder, nails like daggers
Reputation precedes me
Better the Devil you know, than the Devil you don’t see
I rock a microphone till it’s broke
Sharpen my tongue on the smoke
Never choke, chase it with a Jack & Coke
Clear my throat and then gloat
Unapologetic, poetic heretic
Conjuring magic on a timeless classic
Raven hair, crimson lips
Sparks fly from my finger tips

[Chorus]
She’s just a Devil Woman with evil on her mind
Beware the Devil Woman, she’s gonna get you
She’s just a Devil Woman with evil on her mind
Beware the Devil Woman, she’s gonna get you from behind

[Verse 2]
The wind's blowing, spirits callin’
Takin’ it back to the days of “yes y’allin”
Superstitious with a voice that’s vicious
Kickin’ against the pricks, seditious
Drinkin’ Absinthe, burning sage
Reading Blake, listening to Nick Cave
“Tender Prey” to keep the ghosts away
Ice T for the suckas I slay
No compromising, the sun is rising
Oracle prophesizing
Witching hour’s upon us heed the warning
It’s soon to be morning
Dressed in black like a cat I’m darkness
And I’ll curse the first to start talkin’ shit
It’s the season of the bitch and I’m the rebel
Coldest chick in metal!

[Chorus](x2)
She’s just a Devil Woman with evil on her mind
Beware the Devil Woman, she’s gonna get you

[Bridge]
Stay Away
Damn, I see demons
Look Out!

[Verse 3]
I hold the microphone like a grudge
Mood’s sacred and moon has turned to blood
A revelation and seventh sign
It’s an omen when I speak my mind
But don’t mistake this rhyme for kindness
I crafted, carefully designed this track abstract and introspective
For the coven of a witches collective
Strange brew and my crew’s objective
Introduce a new perspective
Subversive, subjective
For the love of the art and reflective
Respect, to Eazy Muthafuckin E!
Godfather of gangsta rap, Rest In Peace
Clever as the Devil but twice as mean
I don’t worship Satan, he worships me!

[Chorus](x4)
She’s just a Devil Woman with evil on her mind
Beware the Devil Woman she’s gonna get you

[Outro]
The original bitch!
Possessed by the Devil
Tairrie B
West Coast Motherfucker!
(Crow calls)
